content.raw:
Hummm some rewording of this?:

The physical state of the world in Gazebo is calculated once per iteration. You can see the number of iterations on the right side of the bottom toolbar. By default, each iteration is equivalent to 1 ms of simulation time. You can press the pause button to pause the simulation and step through a few steps at a time using the step button.
content.html:
Hummm some rewording of this?:

The physical state of the world in Gazebo is calculated once per iteration. You can see the number of iterations on the right side of the bottom toolbar. By default, each iteration is equivalent to 1 ms of simulation time. You can press the pause button to pause the simulation and step through a few steps at a time using the step button.
